member.summary:
TypeChecker: Check the explicit restrictions: ✔ Check CMP is executed in a step prior to ConditionalS: ✔ Dont allow CMP in last step: ✔ dont allow names starting with underscore (protected names): ✔ dont allow empty LHS on Rxn: ✔ dont allow Conc on the same species multiple times: ✔ a ConcS cannot follow after StepS: ✔
Chosen NOT to enforce: (Not true:) only non-conflicting commands in Steps (Not true:) only initialized (conc) species allowed in (source-variable of?) modules protected symbols (such as XgtY, XltY)
